steps.title: Connect
steps.text: Sign up and add repos with one click. Select a donation amount from $0.01 per push.

steps.title: Code
steps.text: Each time you push code to one of your own repos, you’re donating. It’s that simple.

steps.title: Contribute
steps.text: All the donations go to CodeEd, which teaches computer science to girls from underserved communities, starting in middle-school.

two.title: Our Mission
text: As developers we have some of the best jobs in the world, but less than 20% of us are women. Together we can narrow the gap between men and women in the tech industry. Gitback allows developers to donate while doing what they love. Every time you push code to Github, you donate a small amount to teach computer science to girls from underserved communities. Together that's a lot of change.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
onboardingSteps: Everytime you contribute code to one of your public Github repos, you can donate 1 cent to help girls get into coding.
You made 311 contributions last year, that means you would have donated $3.11 over the same period.
We’ve went along and added all your public repos. You can easily add or remove them.
You can also set the amount you wold like to give per contribution, as well as a limit per month, in your settings.
Know your making a difference! Let’s do this!
